Reviews.Title: Excellent Item
Reviews.Author: Narvash "Narvash"
Reviews.Content: This item was very convenient. Its light, and easily used. The option to take both pictures and video is great. The quality overall for both pictures and video are very high. Overall, would recommend for people looking for it being convenient, but not looking for awesome video.

Reviews.Title: This is a nice little camera
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: I am totally happy with this little camera. It works perfect as advertised. It is attached to my computer via the USB and gets charged at the same time. Can not get more convenient than that.

Reviews.Title: Nowhere Near the Quality of a Flip Video
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my classroom to give my students more quality video capability than their cell phones.  And although this camera is easy to use and better than many phones, it is nowhere near the quality of even the oldest/cheapest $100 Flip Video camera.  If you have the extra money and looking for crisp videos, I would invest in a better video camera.

Reviews.Title: Sound
Reviews.Author: Michelle Mong
Reviews.Content: Great for my video purposes, but the sound quality isn't great unless you're right on top of your subject with no background noise.

Reviews.Title: Great Video, So-so camera
Reviews.Author: A P M "Choosy Mom"
Reviews.Content: For a cheap camera, great buy.  For photos, not so much.  I'm not going to use it for photos at all, because I can hardly snap a good one.  A smart phone is perhaps better for both video and photos.  However, being what it is, I think I'll make good use of it for video.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at an amazing low price!!!
Reviews.Author: Willie Stylez
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my 9YO daughter, and she ABSOLUTELY loves it! I like it because it was super cheap (only $25) and I don't have to worry about her (or her younger brother or nephew) breaking it. The only thing it's missing is a flash. Otherwise, the still picture quality is excellent for a 5MP cam. The zoom feature is pretty good. The video cam is fantastic! My daughter makes tons of videos and they are all clear and crisp. Low lighting produces grainy pics/vids but that is to be expected. Get this camera, it is well worth the money!

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: They are functional, but not very hardy. One didn't work when I got it and then after being dropped once a couple of the others broke.

Reviews.Title: Does the job very well.
Reviews.Author: Jehra
Reviews.Content: I like this little camera. It does everything I ask and expect and it is relatively easy to operate. Picture quality is so-so, of course. But I didn't buy it for the picture quality, so I am still pleased.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Aglcan
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my 8 year old. In her eyes this is the best gift and camera she could have received. It was perfect for her, she really loves it.

Reviews.Title: cool lil hd inexpensive cam
Reviews.Author: yayo
Reviews.Content: Its a cool lil inexpensive cam dose what it dose take pics or video with it i like it i have fun with it

Reviews.Title: great starter camers
Reviews.Author: SC shopper
Reviews.Content: bought for Christmas for daughter.  She loves making her own videos and pictures.  very handy little camera.  easy to use

ProductInfo.Features:
One-touch operation for instant capturing of great moments
Integrated USB plug for no-fuss connection to your PC/Mac
Small and slim design to fit easily into your pocket
Relive memories in great detail with full HD videos
Direct TV connection via HDMI for viewing your videos in HD
ProductInfo.Name: Philips CAM102SL/37 5 MP Digital Camera with CMOS Sensor and 4 x Optical Zoom (Silver)
